response.overview: MAITRI BPO - Interview Room is a satirical short film set inside a corporate interview space where power, pressure, and performance quietly collide. Through subtle humor and irony, the film explores the unspoken emotional dynamics between interviewers and candidates, revealing how authority and fear shape human behavior. Inspired by everyday corporate experiences, the film reflects on modern hiring culture while questioning who is truly being tested inside the interview room.
response.tagline: In an interview room, logic takes the day off.
response.title: Maitri Bpo: Interview Room
